items.title: Bearing witness: A doctor's reckoning with Gaza
items.description: Dr Mimi Syed, a US emergency physician, talks about the horrific reality she witnessed in Gaza.
items.content: Dr Mimi Syed, a US emergency physician, talks about the horrific reality she witnessed in Gaza.

items.title: Yemeni bodybuilder fighting to make international dream come true
items.description: Saleh Hussein al-Raidi is fighting against the odds in Yemen in an attempt to make his bodybuilding dreams a reality.
items.content: Saleh Hussein al-Raidi is fighting against the odds in Yemen in an attempt to make his bodybuilding dreams a reality.

items.title: Israel threatens to unleash biblical plagues on Yemen's Houthis
items.description: Defence minister's threat follows report of new missile launch from Yemen.
items.content: Defence minister's threat follows report of new missile launch from Yemen.

items.title: Racism is not 'hate'
items.description: Racism is not simply hatred but a global system of power and profit that sustains inequality and violence.
items.content: Racism is not simply hatred but a global system of power and profit that sustains inequality and violence.

items.title: Israel's genocide in Gaza is "normalised"
items.description: Israel's killings of innocent people is "normalised", as genocide elsewhere would spark global outrage
items.content: Israel's killings of innocent people is "normalised", as genocide elsewhere would spark global outrage

items.title: What did a US court rule on Tren de Aragua deportations?
items.description: Alien Enemies Act cannot deport Venezuelan Tren de Aragua gang, but deportations proceed under immigration laws.
items.content: Alien Enemies Act cannot deport Venezuelan Tren de Aragua gang, but deportations proceed under immigration laws.

items.title: Why is the price of gold hitting record highs?
items.description: The price of gold has soared as investors seek out safe havens amid heightened economic uncertainty.
items.content: The price of gold has soared as investors seek out safe havens amid heightened economic uncertainty.

items.title: Earthquake rescue teams battling to reach survivors in Afghanistan
items.description: Rescuers struggling to reach isolated villages following devastating quake that killed at least 1,400 people.
items.content: Rescuers struggling to reach isolated villages following devastating quake that killed at least 1,400 people.

items.title: NBA to investigate Kawhi Leonard-LA Clippers endorsement deal
items.description: NBA says it will open an investigation into a report that Clippers paid Leonard $28m for no-show job at a company.
items.content: NBA says it will open an investigation into a report that Clippers paid Leonard $28m for no-show job at a company.

items.title: Video: Israeli attacks pound displacement camps in Gaza
items.description: Fires were seen burning in a displacement camp in Gaza City where Israeli forces attacked Palestinians in tents.
items.content: Fires were seen burning in a displacement camp in Gaza City where Israeli forces attacked Palestinians in tents.
